Name: congenital intrinsic factor deficiency
Definition: A vitamin B12 deficiency that is characterized by megaloblastic anemia due to the absence of gastric intrinsic factor which results in abnormal vitamin B12 absorption.

Name: transcobalamin II deficiency
Definition: A vitamin B12 deficiency that is characterized by a lack of vitamin B12 intestinal absorption resulting from a deficiency in the B12 transport protein TCII.
